%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: STONE SKIN
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Passive +15% melee damage protection
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Receiving melee damage grants a stack of 'Stone Skin'
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]+15% melee damage protection/-10% movement speed per 'Stone Skin' stack
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Maximum 10 stacks
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]At 10 stacks, +75% melee damage reduction but become completely immobilized
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Effect lasts 10 seconds, after which all stacks are removed
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_red]Yes

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: DISINTEGRATOR
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]-15% bullet damage received
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Reduced damage is converted to radiation
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_red]Yes

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: TRACES OF WEALTH
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Receive 4% cashback on each purchase
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_green]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: CRITICAL ASCENSION
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Passive +10% critical hit damage bonus
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Consecutive hits grant stacks of 'Critical Ascension'
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Each stack of 'Critical Ascension' grants +5% damage to next shot
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Missing a shot resets stacks and gives psy damage proportional to the amount of prior stacks
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Bonus can be stacked infinitely as long as you don't miss
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Unequipping all 'Spike' artefacts will remove stacks without penalty
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_green]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: LIGHT OF TRANQUILITY
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Restores health and psy health while near campfires
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Amplifies psy recovery artefacts while near campfires
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_green]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: MINOR LACERATIONS
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Your weapon loses 50% damage but gains the ability to cause %c[ui_red]bleeding %c[ui_gray_2]damage
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Bleeding damage is proportional to weapon damage
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Increases chance for enemies to surrender
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_green]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: ZONE ALCHEMY
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Grants the ability to transmutate artefacts
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Artefacts can be upgraded to a better tier (Night Star -> Gravi -> Gold Fish), or "mutated" to a different artifact of the same tier (Night Star -> Stone Blood -> Jellyfish)
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Perk/Top-tier artefacts can only be mutated
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Each transmutation will consume one 'Bat' artefact
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_red]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: SOLAR POWERED
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Grants stat modifiers depending on the current weather:
 %c[ui_gray_2] • %c[ui_gray_2]Clear: health and stamina boost
 %c[ui_gray_2] • %c[ui_gray_2]Partly Clear: small stamina boost
 %c[ui_gray_2] • %c[ui_gray_2]Other: stamina penalty
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_green]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: WILL TO LIVE
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Grants health regen while under 25% health
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Effect increases the closer to you are to death
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_green]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: WEIGHT OF DEVOTION
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Passive small health and stamina regen
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Members of Sin are granted 3x the effect plus psy health regeneration
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Sin companions receive health regen.
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_red]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: BLESSING OF THE ATOM
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Radiation illness grants a stamina boost and slight radiation removal
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_red]Yes

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: THE UNORTHODOX WAY OF TRAVELLING
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Killing anyone will teleport you to the location of their death
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Dangerous if used on airborne targets
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_red]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: DEAL WITH THE DEVIL
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Equipping this artifact will sign the 'Pact with the Zone'

 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_red]Few have had the courage, few have seen the light.

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: INSANITY
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Passive strong psy resistance
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Drains psy health to restore health
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]When health is full, restores psy health
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]There is a chance you will briefly lose control over your body
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]The lower your psy health, the higher the chance and severity
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_red]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: ZONE INFUSION
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stepping into anomalies of various types will infuse your active weapon for 3 minutes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Infused weapon loses 30% damage but gains 50% elemental damage according to the anomaly
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Only electric, thermal and chemical anomalies are valid for infusion
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]You can drop an artefact directly onto a weapon to detroy the artefact and infuse the weapon with a random effect for 10 minutes.
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_red]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: CALORIC COAGULATION
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Drains hunger to cure bleeding
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_red]Yes

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: DODGE THIS
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]20% chance to reflect 35% of bullet damage recived back to the attacker
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Reflections nullify damage
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_red]Yes

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: NECESSARY GLUTTONY
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Provides health bonus on food consumption based on calories
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_green]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: CRACK THE JACKPOT
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Upon a lethal headshot, extra money is dropped
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_green]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: PHANTOM PACIFIST
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Makes you completely invisible
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]1.5 minute total duration
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]During invisibility you may not draw a weapon, talk or 'interact'
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_red]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: THE UNLUCKY CHARM
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]35% chance that incoming bullet damage will be fully redirected to your companion
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]May make some companions suspicious...
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_red]Yes

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: NIGHT OWL
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Bleeding recovery and movement speed increase from dusk till dawn
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Decreases sleepiness at night but increases sleepiness during the day
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_green]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: CHARGER
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Restores batteries while sprinting
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Will not restore dead batteries or devices with no batteries
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_red]Yes

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: THE NUTCRACKER
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Allows a mighty mutant kick
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_green]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: KLEPTOMANIA
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stashes and items give off a dim light
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stashes emit signal to RF-Receiver
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_red]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: STUNNER
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Chance to stun mutant if within 2 meters
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Getting hit by a melee attack will stun the attacker for 3 seconds
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]While stunned, the enemy is unable to attack
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Self harm (i.e. fall damage) will result in artefact discharge
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_green]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: CULINARY HYPERVERSITY
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Convert energy of raw mutant meat into special abilities
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Lasts for 1 minute. Eating different mutant meat will override current effect and restart buff timer

 %c[d_orange]Table of effects:
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Flesh meat: %c[ui_gray_3]1%/sec health regen, 33% bullet damage penalty
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Boar meat: %c[ui_gray_3]25% melee damage reduction
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Dog meat: %c[ui_gray_3]slight bleeding recovery, 1%/sec psy regen
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Pseudodog: %c[ui_gray_3]2%/sec psy regen, 25% psy damage reduction
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Bloodsucker: %c[ui_gray_3]become invisible until a hostile action is performed, moderate bleeding recovery
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Psysucker: %c[ui_gray_3]become invisible until performing a hostile action, 5%/sec psy regen
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Snork: %c[ui_gray_3]50% radiation damage reduction, 5%/sec stamina regen, 5msv/sec radiation cure, large hunger decrease
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Chimera: %c[ui_gray_3]2%/sec health regen, 10%/sec stamina regen, 33% radiation damage reduction
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Lurker: %c[ui_gray_3]33% chem/fire/electric anomaly damage reduction
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Tushkano: %c[ui_gray_3]20% speed increase, 20% melee damage penalty
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_red]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: RAIN OF REVIVAL
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Upon receiving a fatal blow, the artefact is destroyed and the player is revived
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]50% of health is restored, all debuffs are removed and 5 seconds of damage immunity are granted upon revival
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Upon revival, the current weapon is dropped and vision is negatively effected
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_red]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: HIGH VOLTAGE
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stepping on an Electra anomaly will recharge batteries and active devices
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stepping on an Electra anomaly allows infinite sprint for a short period of time
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_red]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: BLOODLUST
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Passive +10% melee damage
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]3.5% of melee damage is converted to health
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Upon killing certain mutants, there is a chance that raw meat will spawn in the vicinity
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_green]No

%c[d_orange]PERK:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Designation: ULTRA-VIOLENCE
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]5% chance that shots will be explosive
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]There is a chance that an npc or mutant killed with an explosive shot will also violently explode
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Effect stacks with multiple artefacts (chance of an explosion)
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Stackable effects: %c[ui_green]Yes
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2]Diminishing returns: %c[ui_green]No
